txt.en: Acquired batch of mashed royal taters ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Hasta is asking that anyone willing to help him should gather the various ingredients necessary to draw forth the menace from beneath the Water-works.

'I am very glad you have decided to help me with this task, [placeholder]. These ingredients would be difficult for one person alone to gather.

'While the other materials being gathered will create the visual representation necessary to fool our quarry, the flavoring of our lure will require a special blend of herbs and spices.

'Bring me the following and I'll put them aside with the rest of the materials:

'Ten phials of mint sauce.
'Ten batches of mashed royal taters.'
Hasta can be found in the Rotting Cellar in the Water-works of Moria.\n\nHasta would like you to bring him ten phials of mint sauce, and ten batches of mashed royal taters.
'Well done indeed, [placeholder]! your contribution is greatly appreciated. Be sure to speak with me again if you have more ingredients to add to the mixture.'
'Have you gathered the materials I requested, [placeholder]?'
Bring phials of mint sauce to Hasta ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring mashed royal taters to Hasta ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring Five Dough Balls to <NAME TBD>
Baiting the Beast:  The Spice of Life
